body_html:
About your issue with #527 I was able to get tensorflow running on the cluster by fully installing myself, see attach script if it can help you.

About clustering myself, I do not see how to as I have but experience in using distributed tf over several machines, any help appreciated: will it work with a clusterspec that specifies several localhost: mappings then attaching one task to each cpu and listen on a different port?

pip_setup.txt

body:
About your issue with #527 I was able to get tensorflow running on the cluster by fully installing myself, see attach script if it can help you.

About clustering myself, I do not see how to as I have but experience in using distributed tf over several machines, any help appreciated: will it work with a clusterspec that specifies several localhost:<port> mappings then attaching one task to each cpu and listen on a different port?

[pip_setup.txt](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/331412/pip_setup.txt)
